title: Ticket #4584: lib_shared_port-collector_van broken on windows
description:
This test turns on the shared port and relocates the socket dir to /tmp to avoid way too long of paths in the tests. It then starts up a personal condor and runs a simple sleep job.

It verifies requests come into the shared port from all the other daemons but fails to see requests for collector in the SharedPortLog.
creator: bt
